title: Egghead
content:
my latest work in progress, have just done upper and lowercase so far. Having special trouble with lowecase j and t.... any comments will be evry much appreciated   
   
   
 ![egghead and egghead bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414143609im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/1458.gif)
author: spiral

comments.content:
i think the j would be better off with 1 less in (x) and the t would be happy with 1 more pixel in the ascender...   
or maybe the j is just fine :|   
i like the over feel however
maybe too tight? try 2 pixel space?
this typeface has been gathering dust... same as this thread. maybe i'll finally get it together and finish this... and maybe even a serifed version....
